name: Glen Bowling
text: Pizza is really good but don't expect to eat in the restaurant unless u are friends of the staff. Went there twice while we stayed in a condo here and both times it was take out only. At least 5-8 kids in there playing pool and hanging with â€¦More

name: equake 2
text: The food was great, staff were very friendly. The restaurant is right next to the lake with a great view.

name: Nic Widhalm
text: Initially had a disappointing experience, but have to say that Bran, the store manager, was super professional and made sure to follow up and fix the situation. It's unusual to find that level of service in a mountain town. I'm definitely impressed.

name: Dave Nelson
text: The Pizza is pretty good, but this place is horribly managed.  I was hear in the "off season" but they need more staffing than a single server and single cook.  There was a steady line of customers waiting at the door then leaving because â€¦More

name: Seren Umbenhower
text: The service I received was spectacular! The entire staff treated me very well. The pizza and wings are delicious and the beer options were everything I hoped for and more. Definitely a go to! I'd call this a hidden treasure in the heart of Keystone. I recommend them even ðŸ˜Š

name: Katy Scruton
text: Great pizza and wings and awesome staff. We own the condo above the restaurant and always love to eat here when we stay. The manager, Marco, is very friendly and always makes our experience an enjoyable one.

name: Ruthie Olson
text: My friends and I went to several other places but they lacked a sense of welcoming attitude and excitement. We went to extreme pizza and ended up meeting a super cool bartender named Marcos. The environment was very great

name: garland g
text: This place was a great hole in the wall pizza place. BEST CALZONE i have ever had! Our bartender Marcos was very personable and informative. Highly recommend Extreme Pizza

name: Logan Olson
text: We visited key stone from out of state. Marcos was the friendliest guy we met out of all the other places we went. Super nice guy and super great pizza

name: Emily Cohn
text: Awesome pizza and Italian menu! For was delicious! Hard to find though, this business is located in a condo development in keystone.

name: Adrianna Lenard
text: Amazing service once again! The manager is very generous and kind. Great staff and even better food! Love the extreme twisted sticks!

name: zxccanada
text:
If you have a car, just drive to town (Silverthorne etc.) and eat there.

The first time we were there it is OK....pizza is delicious and a bit pricy but â€¦More

name: Chelsea Bichekas
text: Mike, the bartender was awesome! Super friendly and made me a great hot cider cocktail. Nathan was our server, he was very friendly too. Food was really good & we liked the atmosphere. Would definitely go back!

name: Trevor Trepanier
text: Great pizza, all of the ingredients were fresh and of quality. Beer selection is ok wish they had more on draft, but their bottle selection is full of verity. All of the staff were super friendly. Prices are great for summit county â€¦More

name: Jeff Chapman
text: Excellent pizza and awesome Italian cheese bread twists. I highly recommend them next time you are in Keystone and want delicious pizza.

name: Justyn Bischoff
text: Overpriced. At least the staff are nice. Don't ask for any discounts.

name: Justin Luscomb
text: I want vegan pizza from here now lol and a beer  so good

name: Autumn Banks
text: BEWARE if you have any food sensitivities. I have Celiac and was very excited to try something from their large gluten free selection. The pickup order took over an hour, was cold, and very small in portion. I didn't mind, as I was elated â€¦More

name: Melissa Crippen
text: I would give less if possible. I arrived with my family (7 and 9 year old boys) at about 3 or 4 till 8pm. We stood at the please wait to be seated sign and at 8:01pm a guy walked through the restaurant and literally shouted to us "we are closed". Keep in mind it says they are open until 10pm online. Very poor customer service.

name: Amy Hadfield
text: This place is amazing. It's down to earth but the quality of both costumer service and the food was beyond what I expected to find, even at Keystone.

name: Beth Ewaskowitz
text: We thought it would be a nice quick place to get pizza, but they never noticed us or the people in front of us standing at the hostess stand... then it took 20 minutes to get our salad, and 20 mins later they said our pizza was ready to go â€¦More

name: Lex Calder
text: Super fresh herbs, which is exceedingly rare.  Great pizza oven as the pizza and calzone came out crispy and awesome.  Fresh taps, friendly staff.  So convenient when staying on resort.

name: Lauren Butcher
text: Friendly staff, but they get a bit flustered if it gets remotely busy. Takes some time for to go orders so it's a good excuse to have a libation while you wait. Ordered a medium Yard Sale pizza and a side salad and had some for leftovers the next day. Decent pizza and a salad us a salad.

name: Brandon Stringer
text: This pizza is one of the best I've ever had! The cheese is da bomb! I got ham and pineapple when I went.

name: Andrew Phillips
text: Went into exteam pizza afternoon riding and was graced with Marcosâ€™s company. Ordered some pizza and a beer and was very happy with everything. Food was quick and delicious. Def recommend stopping by

name: Rick Tessmer
text: Absolutely fantastic. Pizza and wings were outstanding.  Workers were as well.  The view is one of the best parts. Go here!

name: Michele Marrs
text: Good place for pizza and nice to sit on patio and watch pond

name: Stephany Chalarca Yarce
text: The best pizza in Keystone!!! If you visit the place, you should try his margarita too... Delicious!!

name: Malcolm Fritts
text: I have been to this restaurant numerous times in the evening.  Last attempt was 9/11 around 6pm. The sign says that they are open until 9pm but apparently not. I even saw one of the workers whom i had spoken too before. I believe his name â€¦More

name: Rachel Lasher
text: My family ate here after driving 20+ hours. We had a party of 8 on 4 tickets. The first pizza wasnâ€™t right so, he left it and made a new one. The other three pizzas were ordered at the same time. It took a while to get one, then I had to go â€¦More

name: Anne Powell
text: I am sure this place is great but they are grossly understaffed. I stood there for at least 10 minutes and no one even came to say that they were aware I was even there. I thought I might have died and not realized I was a ghost but fortunately went somewhere else and they acknowledged me. Lol

name: John Mills
text: Food is very pricey for small portions. Customer service is among the worst.  Sat at the bar for 15 minutes to pick up a to-go order and nobody even came to the front.  Happily left and ate somewhere else. (Also watch menu prices, they over charge on the bill)

name: Jennifer Wilson
text: Service was slow, even though it was pretty empty. Pizza was decent. Nothing special but at least it wasn't packed on a Sunday.

name: Courtney Copic
text: Had the Ragin Rooster, their version of a BBQ chicken, and loved it! Rated only for stars due to the service- it was slow, and the guy spent a lot of time on his phone while other customers were waiting.

name: Tommy Simmons
text: Great pizza and friendly staff. We had take out but they made everything easy.

name: T A
text: Great pizza! Wings were good too... Friendly staff.

name: Michelle B
text: The pizza and buffalo wings were absolutely delicious. Stunning views and very awesome staff.

name: Hung Duong
text: It has very good pizza but the service is slow.

name: Kirk Yuhnke
text: Service was good, beer prices were cheap but pizza wasn't as good as I hoped. Also, buffalo wings are baked not fried.

name: Kimberly Wilkins
text: Great Pizza,Tasty hot chocolate and great service who i think was marcos who served me

name: Jesse Sfetsas
text: If you want sh*tty, over priced pizza then this is the place to go. You can get better frozen pizza at a grocery store.

name: Lawrence Sproul
text: Energetic and family friendly environment, enthusiastic staff, soothing ambient music, and great food at a modest price. Would definitely eat here again.

name: Dillon Hall
text: Staff is good, I just the manager isn't very professional and screwed us out of a reservation because he didn't communicate anything and is impossible to get a hold of.

name: Jim Easley
text: Love the pizza and salads. Great views and quick service.

name: Mark Harrison
text: The manager Marcos was such a nice guy, he left us with a pleasant experience. And weâ€™ll defientely be coming back :)

name: Brian Stanley
text: Even though it is the only pizza option at lakeside village. Still good pizza.

name: Angie Boone
text: Great Gluten free crust fun flavors & great staff!

name: Denise Davidson
text: They have awesome Gluten free pizza.

name: Brandon Williams
text: Best place in Keystone - relaxed atmosphere, great views, good pizza at a reasonable price. What else could you want?

name: Alex Baab
text: Great thin crust, nice staff, best prices in the area, kid friendly

name: Kyle Blietz
text: Thin crust that fills you up.  Great pizza!

name: Brent Applegate
text: Truly just had the worst pizza experience ever. Paid $26 for a small (they called it a large) frozen, possibly reheated pizza. How do places like this stay in business?!! So, so so bad.

name: jeremy mcgann
text: Staff nice but managed poorly

name: James Armont
text: Fast and friendly with good beer

name: The Imagine Wagon
text: Good food great service

name: Rhonda Brown
text: Our server Bran was awesome! Pizza was delicious!

name: Ashton
text: Loved the pizza and the staff treated me like family.  Will be going back again on our next visit.

name: Ted Huckaby
text: A bit pricey but the pizza is really good.

name: Sarah Boldt
text: Great food and service.

name: reffer man
text: Awesome prices and service

name: Connor Brennan
text: The food took over 45 minutes. The food was aight. The server did not return after we ordered. No one of ta refill. Server couldn't split the bill successfully... Most likely high. Took 3 attempts and withheld change.

name: Jenna Thomas
text: Small little spot next to ice rink...nice staff...and they have pools tables and few little games to play...I am addicted to the quarter push game!

name: deb M
text: People  friends. Love it

name: Coop
text: Extreme Pizza at Keystone has shown me several fantastic dining and drinking experiences!

name: Christine Dimiceli
text: We had a conference of over 700 people they're not that's not even mentioning families that came along and they were not prepared for us. They closed at 7pm so we had to order our food and get out. Which took forever because they were so lowly staffed.

name: Amanda Moore
text: Best pizza hands down!!!

name: Eli Eaton
text: Wednesday at 12:00. Wasnâ€™t open

name: Matthew Aguirre
text: Good pizza

name: Not Sure
text: It was extreme, and good

name: Chris Jaquez
text: Pizza is amazing

name: Gary L Dutton
text: Good place for pizza

name: Contacts Unknown
text: Couldn't even find the place or a place to park. Don't care how good the pizza is if I can't even find the store.

name: Andy Jankowski
text: Great Pizza, but they are small and expensive.

name: Craig Marsteller
text: Good pizza.

name: Daniel Santiago-Gonzalez
text: Get the Green With Envy pizza!

name: Doug Mcbrayer
text: Service is rude.  Don't trust the hours of operation say either.  Closed 3 hours prior to what they say.

name: Brian Young
text: Pizza was really good, fresh ingredients

name: Richard Thyer
text: Nothing special but they have a decent beer selection.

name: Christopher Dirgo
text: Slow, overpriced

name: fernando garza
text: Very nice place I be back
